word_mean: 为结晶性生物碱，可从古柯树(Erythroxyloncoca)的叶(古柯叶)或古柯属(Erythroxylon)其他种的叶获得，也可从芽子碱(ecgonine)或其衍生物合成

entry.def: Cocaine is a powerful drug which some people take for pleasure, but which they can become addicted to.

means.word_mean: 1. a narcotic (alkaloid) extracted from coca leaves; used as a surface anesthetic or taken for pleasure; can become powerfully addictive
